title.rendered: CRMs: A Must-Have Technology for Building & Managing Your Business in 2017

content.rendered:
Learn How to Build and Manage Your Business With a CRM

Want to convert more leads in 2017 and increase your gross commission income? Interested in running your business more efficiently so you have extra time to spend with your family, friends, and hobbies? Regardless of what your annual goals are, the tools included with customer relationship managers (CRMs) are essential for accomplishing them.

Learn why having a CRM will be critical for building and managing your business in 2017 by watching this 30-minute educational webinar. From insight into lead behavior to automated listing alerts and marketing tools, Senior Sales Coach and Market Leader expert Sheldon Rapoza walks through the many features and benefits of this must-have technology.

(There were a couple of issues with the audio at the beginning of this webinar. These issues were fixed after the first several minutes, so most of this recording is issue-free.)

Watch this webinar recording to learn about the many features and benefits of CRMs:

  • Quickly and effectively respond to new leads
  • Stay in touch with past clients
  • Easily market your listings
  • Integration with your website and lead sources
  • And more!

Will You Need More Leads in 2017?

With Market Leader, you can get a guaranteed number of buyer and seller leads every month. These leads are exclusive — not shared with other agents. Lead inventory is limited, so check availability in your desired areas today!
